sections.heading: OUR STANDARDS
paragraphs: SeaNeB is committed to maintaining a safe, respectful, and law-abiding environment. All content posted on our platforms must comply with applicable laws and our community standards.
Content that is defamatory, obscene, hateful, discriminatory, or otherwise harmful is strictly prohibited.

sections.heading: PROHIBITED CONTENT
list: Content that promotes or incites violence or hatred against individuals or groups.
Content involving minors in an inappropriate manner.
Spam, phishing attempts, or misleading information.
Content that infringes on intellectual property rights.
Advertisements for illegal goods or services.

sections.heading: ENFORCEMENT
paragraphs: We reserve the right to remove any content that violates this policy without prior notice. Repeated violations may result in account suspension or termination.
To report violating content, please use our Contact page or email hello@seaneb.com.
